thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 08 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-ZPG Announces A Proposed New Debt Package

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-ZPG Announces A Proposed New Debt Package
text:
Jan 8 (Reuters) - Zpg Plc:
* ZPG PLC - A PROPOSED NEW DEBT PACKAGE CONSISTING OF AN OFFERING OF £200 MILLION SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023 AND A NEW REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY OF £200M
* ZPG PLC -PROCEEDS USED TO REPAY ALL AMOUNTS OUTSTANDING UNDER OUR EXISTING REVOLVING CREDIT FACILITY
* ZPG PLC - PROCEEDS USED TO REPAY AMOUNTS OUTSTANDING UNDER EXISTING TERM LOANS; AND PAY CERTAIN COSTS, EXPENSES AND FEES RELATED TO, REFINANCING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
